description:
Mobileng F1 2012 will help you follow the Formula One World Championship on your WebOS device.

The following information are implemented by now: drivers and constructors standings, circuit, drivers and teams information, results of each race and qualifyings.

This app needs an Internet connection to download data, but some information will be cached for offline use.

Mobileng F1 2012 is free for WebOS users. Enjoy.

New in this version:

Landscape mode.

Added teams gallery.

Added drivers gallery.

More circuits info in circuits gallery.

Races marked as Today the day of the race.

RSS list improved.

Added link to full article in RSS view.

Added German language in Preferences and new RSS sites in German. (thx to S. Sammet)

New version 1.1.5:

Added News View showing RSS services about F1. 

Qualifying (Q1 Q2 Q3) results added in race view results.

Completed races are marked as finished. 

Days until the next race are shown. 

Improved icons.

Formula 1 Copyright Notice.
F1, Formula 1, Formula One, FIA One World Championship, Grand Prix and related marks are trade marks of Formula One Licensing BV, a Formula One group company. All rights reserved. This application is unofficial and is not associated in any way with the Formula One group of companies.
